title: NFL Draft: Most Interesting Teams Pt. 3, Top 10 DB Prospects (Football 4/16)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson and Sean Wagner-McGough to continue their discussion on the 'most interesting' teams in the NFL Draft, with a focus on the Patriots (1:45) and 49ers (9:45). Is it time for New England to lock down a Tom Brady replacement? San Francisco landed another 1st-round pick via trade, but should they now look to shop #13? Next, Bryant McFadden joins the podcast to break down his Top 10 defensive backs in the 2020 Draft (19:15). A former 2nd-round pick himself, BMac revisits some draft memories including the cornerbacks who were selected ahead of him in 2005 (40:45).

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod @WillBrinson, @BMac_SportsTalk

itunes:subtitle: This year's defensive back class is loaded. In this episode, former NFL cornerback and 2nd-round pick Bryant McFadden breaks down his Top 10 DB prospects.
